snippet.title: Little Bug - Now Available
snippet.description:
Little Bug is an award winning twin stick platformer about a young girl finding her inner light. Play as Nyah and her orb in tandem as you journey through a surreal world of restless giant spirits, hot pink tears and hidden treasures. 

Now available for Windows, Mac and Linux on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/822190/Little_Bug/
